name: Jaye and the Hungry Sea
description:
Join Jaye on a journey through stormy oceans and monsters of the deep. Uncover a story about displacement, guilt, and survival.

Submission for the 2021 B&W Game Jam. Currently a work in progress. 

For the best experience, play in full-screen mode (toggle with "F") and use a controller.

Have feedback to share? Want to follow the development of this game? Join our discord and say hello! https://discord.gg/FSb2NZFeE6

Credits

Andrew Han: Programmer, Writer, Level Designer

Joshua Lee: Composer, Sound Designer

Kai 1DR: Artist, Game Designer, Writer, Level Designer
